|brand = Netgear |model = A6200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -100NAS |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = November 19, 2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_A6200_v2 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 3.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle
|vendor_id = 0846 |device_id = 9051 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = NDD9578221212 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 20:E5:2A
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AU; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/05/2015 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00UA98HS8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B008HO9D7M |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== It appears a v2 of the A6200 (using RTL8812AU) USB ID for the device (0846:9051) is found in the driver set for the [[Edimax EW-7822UAC]].
{{see also|Edimax|Netgear A6200}}

==See also== * [[Netgear A6100]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8811AU (0846:9052) * [[Netgear A6200 v1]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM43526 (0846:9050) * [[Netgear A6200 v2]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8812AU (0846:9051) * [[Netgear WNA1000M]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8188CUS (0846:9041) * [[Netgear WNA3100M]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8192CU (0846:9021) * [[Netgear N300MA]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8192CU (0846:f001)
